short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the amount of time you spend online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Time Manager is a simple time tracking tool that will track how much time you spend on each website in your chrome browser.  

With a daily and weekly summary, you can quickly view your web browsing time and daily average time spent online.

In addition to the tracking, you can also set daily timers that will block specified websites if you exceed the set limit.
